name: Cat.io (itch)
description:
Happy Halloween!
Welcome to Cat.io!

Controls:
Move your mouse to move
M to mute music
U to unmute music
Eat the orbs to bring your mass up!
Avoid the enemies! If you have a lower mass than the enemy, you will die! You can also eat enemies if you have a larger mass.
Check your enemies' mass on the top-left corner!
Features:
-New skins in the skin library
-Additional P.O.Y.F (Play on your face)
-Compatibility with Skinseed codes
-Removal of the Shop
New updates for 0.10.8 on October 29, 2018 (Live Date)

Gamejolt version: https://gamejolt.com/games/cat-io-game/370175

Itch.io version: You're on it :)
 
Make a skin!: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/248458519/
